definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge

sentences.english: It has a Heng Islam Yeshiva of Qinghai in this mosque.
sentences.chinese: 该清真寺内设立有青海阿横伊斯兰教经学院。

sentences.english: An air strike killed five people in a mosque as dusk fell.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏时一次空袭打死了清真寺里的5个人。

sentences.english: There are also gorgeous mosques here, such as the Nasir al-Mulk Mosque.
sentences.chinese: 这里也有美丽的清真寺，例如粉红清真寺。

sentences.chinese: 这里也有美丽的清真寺，例如粉红清真寺。
他们希望清真寺被拆掉。

sentences.english: Muslin Halal shops will usually write the letter "786" in Myanmar numeral.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林清真商店通常会写字母“786”缅甸的数字。

sentences.english: Shortly after this the imaun and the other ministers of the mosque arrived.
sentences.chinese: 不久后这个阿訇和其他的清真寺公使来了。

sentences.english: The flagship halal dish from China, hand-pulled noodles hail from the wild, sandy lands of northwest China.
sentences.chinese: 作为清真食品的代表，兰州拉面来自西北多沙的野外。

sentences.english: Sieghart says the mosques are heavy users of water.
sentences.chinese: Sieghart说这些清真寺是用水大户。

sentences.english: On Friday midday I passed by the large Square in front of the Id Kah mosque in Kashgar.
sentences.chinese: 星期五中午我路过艾提尕尔清真寺前的广场。

sentences.english: Muslim man prayed during at a mosque in Malaga, southern Spain, Monday.
sentences.chinese: 斋月，一名穆斯林男子在马拉加的一间清真寺内祷告。

sentences.english: This exertion, Xuan Yuan green dragon then ugg boots jade Islamic human together before wading into castle.
sentences.chinese: 这功夫，轩辕青龙便和玉清真人一起走进了前殿。

sentences.english: Naci was playing backgammon with the imam from the local mosque.
sentences.chinese: 纳希和本地清真寺的阿訇在玩西洋双陆棋。

sentences.english: A minaret lays crumbled on the rooftop of the local mosque.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯兰式的尖塔倒塌在清真寺的楼顶。

sentences.english: The shrine is believed by many to be the tomb of the Prophet Muhammad's son-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都相信这座清真寺是先知穆罕默德女婿的陵墓。

sentences.english: There was a Festival of the Fast-Breaking Ceremony in the mosque today.
sentences.chinese: 今天在清真寺举行了开斋节庆典。
